title: What is the latest technology we are using? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology is updating on regular basis either it is in the field of WEB development or Mobile development . As example Mobile development has a new technology of XAMRIN in which we can develop APPs Once and that can be used for both android and iOS For More Information please visit Facebook Itronix Solution
Its not public yet but the cost effective launching tech used by ISRO
